feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add certificate in completed webhook by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/738
  • fix: change baseUrl in APIs by @ugoconsonni in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/719
  • fix: resend mail API is not working by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/737
  • fix: some webhook event are not working for second signer & add certificate in completed webhook by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/738

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add download button in ellipsis menu beside finish button so that signers can download a doc for reference before they sign by @prafull-opensignlabs in
  • feat: add copy icon beside API token to make it more user friendly by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/742
  • feat: move forget password button inside login box to make it look better by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/743
  • feat: add resend mail functionality for in-progress documents by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/744
  • feat: celebration confetti on document completion by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/753
  • feat: add delete folder API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/740
  • feat: allow customizing email before resending signature request from In-progress documents report UI by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/749
  • feat: users can now send automatic reminders by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/754
  • feat: add tour messages to request signatures flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/763
  • feat: add help button for text validation by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/767
  • fix: unnecessary emails are sent when a signers sign a document via a shared link. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/760
  • fix: issue in guest-login if document is created using API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/766
  • build(dep): update parse-server package and it's dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/756
  • build(deps): update node-signpdf package and it's dependencies, remove customsignpdf by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/759
  • build(deps): update @reduxjs/toolkit package by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/750
  • build(deps): react-redux, autoprefixer , react-datepicker axios, @reduxjs/toolkit, react-tooltip, tailwindcss react-pdf by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/761
  • build(deps): update dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/762

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: quick send feature to create & send multiple documents at a time by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/772
  • feat: add download, certificate & print buttons on the document completion popup by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/768
  • feat: SSO and Login improvements by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/793
  • fix: duplicate contacts could be created, Update the the header 'Document signed' in the success message popup by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/786
  • fix : update USE_LOCAL variable by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/789
  • fix: make phone field optional for contact by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/787
  • fix: not able to create contact from add user icon in document preview UI by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/790

  • fix: mails were being sent even when send_email was to false to stop through API by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/805

  • build(deps-dev): bump lint-staged from 15.2.4 to 15.2.5 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/778

  • build(deps-dev): bump @babel/eslint-parser from 7.24.5 to 7.24.6 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/781
  • build(deps-dev): bump nodemon from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/782
  • build(deps-dev): bump @babel/runtime-corejs2 from 7.24.5 to 7.24.6 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/777
  • build(deps): bump reactour from 1.19.3 to 1.19.4 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/796
  • build(deps-dev): bump prettier from 3.2.5 to 3.3.0 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/799
  • build(deps): updated nth-check dependency for security by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/804
  • build(deps) : react-rnd && mongoose by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/809
  • build(deps-dev): bump nodemon from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.7.3...v1.8.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Ensure real-time updates to records in reports after actions are performed by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/832
  • fix: cannot read property of undefined 'email' by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/802
  • Fix: Third contact is not receiving mail when second contact is non-existent in quick send by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/835
  • Fix: smtp is not working by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/836
  • build(deps): minor update by @Zathiel in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.8.0...v1.8.1

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Revamp entire UI by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/840
  • feat: enhance compatibility with high-resolution displays and improve UI responsiveness. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/869
  • feat: update UI design of my signature by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/877
  • fix: Ensure real-time updates to records in reports after actions are performed by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/833
  • fix: blank screen when trying to send document in some cases by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/842
  • fix: cannot open pdf in safari < 17.4 by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/852
  • fix: widget's position errors caused by different page sizes in landscape orientation by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/870
  • fix: exiting user can't receive bulk emails, input widgets's size reduced in request-sign process by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/880
  • fix: previous text signature is not cleared issue with the signature pad in the sign-yourself flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/881
  • fix: resolve issues with text box widgets and the UI design of the request sign flow in mobile view, adjust the signature widget ratios, and remove the mail sent celebration effect. by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/876
  • build(deps-dev): bump prettier from 3.3.0 to 3.3.2 in /apps/OpenSignServer by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/856
  • build(deps-dev): bump eslint from 8.57.0 to 9.5.0 in /apps/OpenSign by @dependabot in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/854
  • build(deps): update dependencies by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.8.1...v2.0.0
